generation_metadata: A red sports car with 16 precisely defined views: View 1 (0°, 0°): Front view, View 2 (45°, 0°): Front-right, View 3 (90°, 0°): Right side, View 4 (135°, 0°): Back-right, View 5 (180°, 0°): Back view, View 6 (225°, 0°): Back-left, View 7 (270°, 0°): Left side, View 8 (315°, 0°): Front-left, View 9 (0°, 45°): Front elevated, View 10 (90°, 45°): Right elevated, View 11 (180°, 45°): Back elevated, View 12 (270°, 45°): Left elevated, View 13 (0°, -45°): Front lowered, View 14 (90°, -45°): Right lowered, View 15 (180°, -45°): Back lowered, View 16 (270°, -45°): Left lowered. All views maintain identical lighting (soft directional from top-left), same red metallic paint, and consistent scale (car occupies 70% of each square).
image_prompt: A set of sixteen digital photographs arranged in a 4x4 grid featuring a red sports car captured from 16 precisely defined angles. Each sub-image shows the car from a distinct viewpoint with specific azimuth and elevation angles. The car is centered in each view, with identical soft directional lighting from top-left, consistent red metallic paint, and uniform scale (70% of square size). The background is pure white with no shadows or other objects, suitable for 3D reconstruction.
description: Generated improved 4x4 grid with precise angle specifications and consistent lighting

previous_iteration_metadata.generation_metadata: A red sports car with 16 different views arranged in a 4x4 grid. Each view shows the car from a distinct angle including front, back, left, right, top, bottom, and various oblique angles. The car maintains consistent lighting, scale, and positioning across all views. Background is pure white suitable for 3D reconstruction.
previous_iteration_metadata.image_prompt: A set of sixteen digital photographs arranged in a 4x4 grid featuring a red sports car captured from different angles. Each sub-image shows the car from a distinct viewpoint: front, back, left, right, top, bottom, and various oblique angles. The car is centered in each view, with consistent lighting, scale, and positioning. The background is pure white with no shadows or other objects, suitable for 3D reconstruction.
previous_iteration_metadata.description: Generated a 4x4 grid of car views for 3D reconstruction

evaluation_results.suggestions_for_improvement: Improve metadata accuracy with more specific angle descriptions
evaluation_results.metadata_suggestions: Add specific angle measurements and lighting specifications for each view
